node.title: 20. Daniel 9 and Jesus
node.description: After Daniel’s confusing and unresolved vision in chapter 8, we find him once again in Daniel 9 trying to understand those pesky 2300 days. Gabriel is sent with an additional message for Daniel, and in tonight’s message we explore the links between Daniel 8 and 9 and the strong evidence compelling us to acknowledge that Jesus indeed fulfilled this prophecy!
